titleStmt.title: Ad fratrem de Insignibus suis Epigramma.

analytic.title: Ad fratrem de Insignibus suis Epigramma.

monogr.title: The golden-groue : moralized in three bookes: a worke very necessary for all such, as would know how to gouerne themselues, their houses, or their countrey. Made by W. Vaughan, Master of Artes, and student in the ciuill law
monogr.author: Vaughan, William

div.head: Ad fratrem de Insignibus suis Epigramma.
div.l: AMhigo, cur bicolor nostrae Leo stirpis alūnus!
Bestia cur, frater, 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 tua est!
Num quia purpurei nostrum sit stemma reatus
Num quia conueniant, Insignia dissona, in vnum
Tam genus Austrinū, quam Boreale genus?
Vel quia Caucaseo similem de monte Leonem
Forte Molorchaeus leo talis ab Hercule cesus;
Sed quî sit nostrum, seu qua ratione colorent
Causa latet, Let he mysteria tanta colorum
Abluit, haec centum noscere lustra vetant.
Macte Leone tamen, frater charissime, macte
